text: Rubiyan salad ( or jambariyy salad meaning shrimp salad), is a salad of Arab salads, it typically of shrimp, tomato. mayonnaise, lettuce leaves, ketchup, hot sauce, mustard, lemon juice, and salt. ==See also== * List of Arab salads * ==References== Category:Arab cuisine Category:Salads
title: Rubiyan salad
